name: gumbot
description:
Poor Gumbot is stranded on a dangerous planet.

He must face water that may rust him and, if he's not careful, an extremely angry narrator.

Gumbot is a mix of

a point-and-click adventure and an action-dodging game.

Can you get all three endings?

There are three endings in Gumbot. The first one is exploding tragically into rainbow dust, the second one is flying away on a rainbow spaceship through a rainbow galaxy. The third one? That ones a secret ; ).

Sound is necessary!!!
